name: Ashi
greetingText: I feel so fortunate to have met the most beautiful you in the most beautiful years of my life
wishText:
May your youthful beauty remain like blossoms in your hair,
 year after year. May your dark tresses never grow old, and may every year be filled with joy
textInChatBox: I wish you a very very very happy birthday!!! Lots and lots of happiness...
text2: I want to give you a surprise
text3: I thought about it seriously for a long time
text4: I realized that I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are very special to me.
outroText: I hope you enjoy this little surprise!
replayText: If you like it, you can watch it again! Or...
